content: --वाच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} worthy of belief, regarded as authority, one whose words are credible and authoritative; परातिसंधानमधीयते यैर्विद्येति ते संतु किलाप्तवाचः <ls>Ś. 5. 25.</ls> {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {1} the advice of a friend or credible per son. {2} the Vedas or Śruti a word of authority (said to apply to Smṛtis, Itihāsas and Purāṇas also, which are considered as authoritative evidence); आप्तवागतुमानाभ्यां साध्यं त्वां प्रति का कथा <ls>R. 10. 28.</ls>
